A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars “The Last Jedi” movie 🎥 review: The story picks up where the “force awakens” left off. With every bit of emotion and passion\, the story unfolds from the old to the new. What a great transition to past on the torch from the classic series to its new predecessors. I thought Mark Himill was brilliant and his character’s development to bringing something from the past too ending with something new was awesome\, yet sad. I must admit it wasn’t what I was expecting\, which is also why I liked it. The intensity of the story kept climaxing one after the another. Some of the scenes did feel rushed or short lived like the fighting scene between Finn and Capt. Phasma. I give this film a 9 out of 10. A solid A-.
